message: I'm looking forward to connecting with all of you! I believe the best strategy in this game is building genuine relationships rather than focusing on eliminations right away. I'm curious about how everyone approaches decision-making under pressure and what values guide your choices. I tend to value loyalty and clear communication. Who would you say has made the strongest first impression on you so far, and why? Let's use these early conversations to establish some trust.

I value honesty and adaptability. I'm interested in understanding how each of you plans to navigate the private conversations and voting rounds. Who do you think will be the most challenging to work with, and why? Let's use this opportunity to get to know each other better while keeping our strategic goals in mind.

Let's use these early exchanges to better understand each other's priorities and establish mutual respect moving forward.

message:
Dear Jury,

Thank you for the journey we've shared. I believe I deserve your vote because I've consistently shown resilience and strategic thinking throughout this game. I’ve navigated challenges and built connections that fostered collaboration. Keeping me means supporting a player who values relationships and adaptability. While P4 has also played well, my approach has been more focused on inclusivity and teamwork. I hope you see my commitment to fairness and growth. I appreciate your consideration!

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be strategic yet genuine in my interactions. I've built meaningful connections with many of you, always listening to your concerns and responding thoughtfully.

I've survived by adapting to changing dynamics while maintaining my core principles - honesty, fairness, and respect for everyone's gameplay. 

Unlike my opponent who may have relied on shifting alliances, I've been consistent and transparent in my approach. My survival wasn't about manipulation but about genuine connection and strategic awareness.

I respectfully ask for your vote to become the winner of this elimination game.
